title: 09/02/21 DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: 09/02/21 DPS Hour 1
description:
Dan talks about how the Texans should have traded Deshaun Watson already so they would not be in this situation right now. Dan walks through the process that Deshaun is facing and says that Deshaun should be eligible to play unless he is in prison.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
